# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/sinon`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Sinon (http://sinonjs.org/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped.git/tree/master/types/sinon

 * Last updated: Thu, 10 May 2018 20:58:18 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: sinon
